rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 13 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat) and Tropical Storm CRISING

Issued at: 4:45 AM, 19 July 2025(Saturday)



ORANGE WARNING LEVEL: Zambales, Bataan, Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas, Rizal, Bulacan, Pampanga and Laguna(San Pedro, Binan, Santa Rosa, Cabuyao, Calamba, Alaminos, Calauan, Los Banos, Bay, Victoria, Mabitac, Pangil, Pakil, Santa Maria, Famy, Siniloan).

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING is still THREATENING.



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Tarlac, Quezon, Nueva Ecija and Laguna(Liliw, Luisiana, Magdalena, Majayjay, Nagcarlan, Pagsanjan, Pila, Rizal, San Pablo, Santa Cruz, Cavinti, Kalayaan, Lumban, Paete).

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 AM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
